title: Anyone else unable to connect to the login que?
body: Just got home saw maintenance and i cant log-in.....this a general issue?

replies.body: This was an issue during maintenance on NA today.  It's finished now, so everything should be okay.  Let me know if you run into any problems logging in, though.
No other issues you guys got it cleaned up right around the time you said 3pm i think it was.
It is, currently.  Apparently a select few have been able to get on just fine, but for the majority of us our logins are failing.
Ok, thank you very much for the response.
